Articles.Content: I used to think Sjin and Duncan were the good guys in their Tekkit series. Now I think different. Ever since I watched Rythian's Blackrock Chronicles I can only think of how much of a jerk Duncan and Sjin were. I was their follower! Now they betrayed me. I will never see Sjin or Duncan the same way ever again.

You shouldn't be to attached to a YouTuber. When you don't like them anymore stop watching them or do it anyway.

Don't be an overly attached Fanboy.

You shouldn't be to attached to a YouTuber. When you don't like them anymore stop watching them or do it anyway.

Don't be an overly attached Fanboy.

But their stories are so entrapping!

But their stories are so entrapping!
Then just don't think about what ever happened and keep looking them.

Canopus, you are kind of being a jerk. This guy subscribed to a channel, learned they're eviiiiiill, and then you tell him to "When you don't like them anymore stop watching them or do it anyway.

Don't be an overly attached Fanboy."

Kind of a jerk. Also, jeez, they are kind of evil though.

Canopus, you are kind of being a jerk. This guy subscribed to a channel, learned they're eviiiiiill, and then you tell him to "When you don't like them anymore stop watching them or do it anyway.

Don't be an overly attached Fanboy."

Kind of a jerk. Also, jeez, they are kind of evil though.

Isn't it true? He shouldn't be so sad that about what some Youtubers say. And please don't call me a Jerk.

Edit: Sorry if was misunderstood but my post was in no way intended as an offense towards the Director of the NASI

Edited June 17, 2013 by Canopus

Isn't it true? He shouldn't be so sad that about what some Youtubers say.

Agreed. If you attach your happyness to the behavior of people who don't even know you you're in for a rough ride. It's general good advice for life.

Just out of curiosity. I occasionally watch the yogscast. What did they do that was so evil?

I don't think the OP was doing anything wrong. You may not know the Youtuber personally, but when you think you know someone (to a certain extent), even if it's through one way communication, I think it's natural to be dissapointed when they turn out to be a bad person. That whole seperating the art from the artist thing, sometimes you wish you didn't have to. Part of the joy of watching a youtuber or comedian or even listening to someone's music or watching the movies they make is seeing their personality show through in their creative work. If they turn out to have a dark side to that personality, it can taint it.

Agreed. If you attach your happyness to the behavior of people who don't even know you you're in for a rough ride. It's general good advice for life.

Just out of curiosity. I occasionally watch the yogscast. What did they do that was so evil?

Sjin and Duncan blew up Rythian's base with a nuke. For no reason.

Sjin and Duncan blew up Rythian's base with a nuke. For no reason.

It's possible that they were just messing around. Was Rythian upset?

It's possible that they were just messing around. Was Rythian upset?

Very. I think it even killed Zoeya.

Very. I think it even killed Zoeya.

In that case... yeah.

Kurtjmac does Minecraft vids, if you want an alternative.

If you want a youtuber to watch and think of as cool, there's always me!

...Please think I'm cool ._.
